title: Is instant feedback live on OCE?
body: Saw posts about instant feedback going live on OCE, just saw people flaming the crap out of their team two days ago and then they played for another two days straight feeding. Would totally love to link names but forum won't let me .

replies.body:
Yep it's live!

The settings are fairly conservative while it's still being tested and they will be ramped up more aggressively over time.

It's being monitored by the PB team and players are getting picked up. It's super important that you report any negative behaviour you see in game.

There were also a few threads over the weekend about it:

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/AsuHrKhn-bans-are-to-harsh?comment=0006

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/Mtbk5OpB-the-double-standards-set-by-riot-are-a-joke?comment=0007

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/QiQGxn3l-suspensions-and-banning?comment=0002

No one has been willing to post their chat log from the report yet though.

>No one has been willing to post their chat log from the report yet though.

I wonder why.

These were a great read thanks.

The tears are delicious.

Yeah all these people got rekt finally, 

no more asshats acting like the king of the hill where they get away scott free from doing whatever they want because they think that everything revolves around them so they deserve to get away with it...

Peace at last, thank you Riot
